actions.description: The nagpa makes three Staff or Deathly Ray attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 24 (7d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Staff

actions.description: 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (7d6 + 6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Deathly Ray

actions.description:
The nagpa casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
At will: detect magic, mage hand, message, minor illusion

2/day each: fireball, fly, hold person, suggestion, wall of fire

1/day each: dominate person, etherealness, feeblemind
actions.name: Spellcasting

languages: Common plus up to five other languages
name: Nagpa [MoM]
